story.content: It's summertime, and you go to your grandparents' house in the countryside for your vacations.
Your grandparents go to the shopping centre and you are left home alone. You don’t want to be bored, so you decide to go on an adventure.

You stay inside the house, you can stay on the current floor, go up into the attic or go down into the basement? You have to be careful because the house isn’t in a good shape!
What do you choose?
You go upstairs into the attic. The attic is a bit messy, so you start tidying it up. You find a lot of interesting stuff while tidying up.

You continue tidying up, and you find something huge covered with a white cloth. You remove the cloth, and under the cloth there is a huge chest. Unfortunately it is locked with a padlock, the key has to be somewhere around here...

responses.content: Just pick the lock with a hairpin
You found an old vinyl record case, look there
Look behind the curtains, it has to be there
It has to be in grandpa's old pair of shoes
Take a look inside grandpa's old backpack

story.content:
?{0} Pretty neat place to hide something - you think.
Then you jump in excitement and open the padlock...
You manage to pick the lock. You feel proud because you have never been able to pick a lock before.

You open the chest, it is full of green styrofoam packing material. You reach into the styrofoam and your hand touches something... just as you would take the item out your grandparents arrive home and tell you that they have never known what was in that chest.

You pull out the item your hand touched. It's an old photo, you reach into the chest again and find many more old photos. Your grandma tells you that these are pictures from her childhood.
You take the pictures down into the living room and your grandma tells you stories about the pictures and her childhood until midnight.
This is my favourite day of summer - you think to yourself.

You try to pull out the item you just touched but you can't, so you ask grandpa for help. Together you pull out a heavy goldbar from the chest. Your grandpa almost drops the goldbar because he starts jumping in hapiness.

Your grandparents become very happy.
Finally we can repair this old house! -grandma shouts.
We can travel around the world - says grandpa.

You talk about what you are going to do with all this money until the night comes.

image.placeholder: A gold pot with a rainbow

story.content: You stay on this floor. You look around and see a shelf and an empty table in the garden.

Just as you would start searching for some board games your grandparents arrive. You ask your grandma whether she has some games to play with.
She comes back with three games, which one do you chose?
You play a game of ?{0}. It was exciting and also your grandma taught you new things while you were playing. You

responses.content: Play one more game then do something else

story.content:
You play many more games of ?{0} then you go to sleep.
The next day you sign up for a ?{0} competition just for fun.
You win all the matches and become a ?{0} champion!

You play one more game of ?{0} then you get bored so you try to use your phone but you have got no signal.
So instead you go outside.
You decide to help grandma with lunch. You look around the house and find that you can help grandma in two ways:
You grab a tablecloth from the drawer and put it on the table. Then go to grab some plates from the dressers highest shelf...
You manage to grab all the plates and put them on the table. You go back for cups and utensils, and also bring them out into the garden.

Your hand slips while reaching for one of the plates. You knock it off the shelf and it breaks into million little pieces.
You grandma arrives and tells you that you broke an antique plate. She looks very angry and she slaps you in the face.

You help grandma clean up the mess.
She forgives you and everything goes on as usual...

You find all of the necessary ingredients in the kitchen but you can't find eggs.
So you go out to grab some...
You go down into the basement. There you can find some cans stockpiled and a bookshelf.

You go to the pile of cans. You pick one of the cans up and read its label:
They're tuna cans...

Phew!
It's good you inspected the cans further, because they have expired almost three months ago. If you have eaten them you may have died!

You go upstairs to make tuna salad. Your grandparents arrive, you sit down to eat.
A few hours after lunch you all start feeling weird, so you go to a doctor. The doctor tells you it's probably food poisoning but nothing to worry about. The tuna you have eaten may have gone off a bit.

You walk to the bookshelf. There are a lot of books on this bookshelf but one book stands out, it has got no cover nor title written on it.
You try to take it off the shelf, but you can't. As you try to pull harder you hear a click and the bookshelf starts rolling away, revealing a secret room.

image.placeholder: A hand taking a blank book from a shelf

story.content: You walk into the secret room. You see a lot of special equipment and something that looks like a gun...

Just as you would touch one of the oscilloscopes on the desk, grandpa touches your shoulder. He tells you that he has been working on this gun like thing that allows people to teleport from one place to another.
You help grandpa fix device's issues, patent it and start selling it. Later that year you receive a Nobel prize for your invention!
You go outside, you see some animals. Which animal would you like to go to?
You see multiple horses. Which one would you like to saddle?
You saddled your horse and went outside to the obstacle course. It's a beautiful summer day, the sun is shining and the weather is clean.
There is a wide range of obstacles to choose from. Like walls, smaller gates and even a big circle to jump through. Which one would you like to try first?

responses.content: Try the easiest one first and slowly make progress
Try the hardest one first, I'm confident with horses

story.content: Ouch, that hurt! The horse stops right in front of the obstacle and you fall to the ground. The horse accidentally steps on you, so you are rushed to a hospital, the doctor tells you it's nothing serious, just stay in bed for a few days.
WOW! You made your first jump very easily, slowly you progressed towards the hardest obstacles, no doubt you cleared them easily. You practice every day and become a world-famous horse showjumper.
You go to the cows. You can hear them moo. You find a bucket, a bar of soap and a pair of rubber gloves.

You milked one of the cows, it was a truly fascinating experience. Now you have a bucket full of milk.
What do you want to do with all this milk?

You make butter but don't know what spices to add to your mixture, so you improvise a bit.
Your grandparents arrive home and see what you're doing, your grandma immediately tastes the butter. She makes a weird face then with a smile she tells you that she has never tasted such delicious and creamy butter.
You give her your recipe and she starts selling your butter at the marketplace. Soon a businessman recognises your expertise in making butter and makes you world-famous.
You drink the milk, suddenly you start feeling weird. You can understand what the cows are saying. The cow you milked turns to you and says:
You drink the milk, suddenly you start feeling weird. You can feel your throat getting sore. You suddenly fall unconsciously to the floor.
You wake up in a hospital bed, a nurse walks in and tells you that the milk you drank had harmful microbes in it. If everything goes alright you can leave the hospital within 3 days.
I gave you superpowers because we are in great danger. You have to save the world from a supervillain, who wants to steal all of our milk!

You go to the chickens house, it is a small brown house, it looks exactly like a dog house, just bigger. You find some eggs in the nests.
You put some of the eggs into your basket.

You walk back to the house.
You bake a chocolate cake for your grandparents using the eggs you've just collected.
Just as you would grab some of the eggs a rooster attacks you. It is a huge rooster, it's much bigger than the usual ones. It start pecking your leg and flapping its wings furiously.

You ran away from the rooster into a nearby forest. You lose the rooster but now you can't find your way out, because all of the trees look exactly the same and there is no footpath to follow so you start yelling...

A nearby forest ranger hears you shouting and helps you out of the forest. He takes you home and advises you not to go inside the forest again. You get tired after all this excitement and go to sleep.
You start fighting with the rooster. Suddenly you see a police officer passing by, he stops his car right in front of you. You sigh in relief, finally someone who can help me!

The officer steps out of his car, he fires his gun to scare the rooster away, then puts you into handcuffs. He tells you that you will be taken to the police station for questioning, because he's just clearly witnessed animal cruelty.

After questioning you are released, because the police understood that you didn't want to harm the rooster, it just attacked you.
A police officer takes you back to the house where you find your grandparents worrying because they couldn't find you.
You calm them down, tell them what has happened and have a good laugh about it!
After questioning you are sent to court because the policemen couldn't decide what has really happened. The story you told them didn’t quite make sense to them...
Your grandparents arrive and see that you have prepared a nice lunch in the garden. So you have lunch together between nice smelling roses under the summer sun.
